componentMetadata.docblock: A component for the continue button to navigate through panels of questions.

childrenComponentProp.name: onButtonClick
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Function called when the button is clicked.

childrenComponentProp.name: buttonClass
childrenComponentProp.docblock: CSS class(es) to apply to the button

childrenComponentProp.name: beforeText
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A character to appear before the button text. This is wrapped in a `span.button-icon`.

childrenComponentProp.name: afterText
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A character to appear after the button text. This is wrapped in a `span.button-icon`.

childrenComponentProp.name: submitButton
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Whether the button is a submit button
